thread.title: Great stay at The Roger
thread.title_full: Great stay at The Roger - Review of The Roger, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Danny316
title: Great stay at The Roger
text:
We stayed here for 4 nights during a recent trip to NYC
Hotel was excellent, every staff member was a real credit to the hotel and nothing was too much trouble.
We were close to the Empire State, 2 or 3 Blocks and 33rd Subway was just round the corner.
The room was comfortable with an excellent shower.
All staff members on hand to advise on recommendations etc and you have free use of 2 computers in the lobby if you want to look anything up online
The Rockerfeller and Times Square are about 10-15 walk away
We were leaving the day the Blizzard came and although we got very wet and very cold with the snow, seeing Central Park in a blanket of white was like a dream come true!
**The Crooked Knife is a 2 minute walk away with some excellent food and drinks**
We would not hesitate to return to The Roger and already planning it!
